sentences.en: A book as big as that is not a manageable size.
sentences.cn: 象那本那么大的书是不是装订的.

sentences.en: Decentralized organization has become commonplace, aided by computer - augmented control systems that make diversity more manageable.
sentences.cn: 分散经营管理的组织已很普遍, 借助于由计算机增强了的控制系统,使得分散管理更为可行.

sentences.en: Ditching was a nasty but manageable maneuver.
sentences.cn: 水面迫降虽然不愉快,却是容易掌握的手段.

sentences.en: Divide the task into manageable sections.
sentences.cn: 把工作分成几个部分，方便处理。

sentences.en: Keep your spending on luxuries down to manageable proportions.
sentences.cn: 将你在奢侈品上的花费降至可控范围。

sentences.en: Medium trees, opening more branches, the branches straight, angle suitable tree manageable.
sentences.cn: 树势中等, 树枝较开张, 发枝顺直, 角度适宜,树体易管理.

sentences.en: My hair is much more manageable since I had it cut short.
sentences.cn: 自从我把头发剪短以来,它好梳理多了.

sentences.en: On the same page advance with some machines manageable size live piece.
sentences.cn: 预先配页同样对一些机器装订的活件不利.

sentences.en: Purchase manageable at indication however shipment June July seller option.
sentences.cn: 一切按指示洽购,但装船要在六、七月间,由卖方自行选定.

sentences.en: Steps must be taken to reduce the problem to manageable proportions.
sentences.cn: 必须采取措施将问题缩小到可控制的范围.

sentences.en: Such solutions were more manageable, more perspicuous, and more readily used for calculation.
sentences.cn: 这样的解,在计算中是更易于掌握的, 更明白的, 并且是更易于使用的.

sentences.en: The operational and manageable application mode of digital home gateway was proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了数字家庭网关可运营、可管理的应用模式.

sentences.en: The present flow of refugees was manageable.
sentences.cn: 目前难民的流动尚可控制。

sentences.en: To force the test situation toward manageable proportions it is universal practice to calibrate.
sentences.cn: 为了使测试工作切实可行,普遍采用的是数据校准.

sentences.en: Use conditioner regularly to make your hair soft and manageable.
sentences.cn: 经常使用护发剂来使你的头发柔软而且易于梳理。

sentences.en: While life is not always fair, it is always manageable.
sentences.cn: 虽然人生并不总是公平的, 但却总是可以掌控.

words.tran_cn: 管理；管理人员；管理部门；操纵；经营手段

trans.tran_cn: 易处理的，易控制的，可做到的，温顺的
trans.tran_en: easy to control or deal with
